name: Association of Christian Schools International
description: ACSI is the largest Protestant educational organization in the world, serving over 24,000 schools in 108 countries. ACSI accreditation ensures that Christian schools meet high academic standards while maintaining their faith-based mission. Schools must demonstrate excellence in academics, spiritual formation, and operational practices.
recognition: ACSI accreditation is recognized by the Florida Department of Education and accepted by colleges and universities nationwide. ACSI is a member of the National Council for Private School Accreditation (NCPSA).
benefits: Recognized by Florida DOE for scholarship eligibility
